title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.42 - Express, baggage and manifest baggage subject to I.C.C. regulations not handled unless in compliance with applicable provisions of such regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1220.42 - Express, baggage and manifest baggage subject to I.C.C. regulations not handled unless in compliance with applicable provisions of such regulations

State Regulations

Express, baggage, and manifest baggage, subject to
I.C.C. regulations, will not be handled at the terminal, unless it complies
with the said regulations in every respect including without limiting the
generality of such regulations proper condition for transportation, containers
of adequate strength, packing, marking, labeling, description, certification, and quantity and loading limitations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1220.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
